title: Letní stadion, Pardubice
text:
Letní stadion is a former multi-purpose <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Pardubice">Pardubice</a>, <a href="Czech%20Republic">Czech Republic</a>. From demolition in 1968 is intended only for <a href="association%20football">football</a>. It is the home stadium of <a href="women%27s%20association%20football">women's football</a> team <a href="FK%20Pardubice">FK Pardubice</a> (women) and <a href="American%20football">American football</a> team Pardubice Stallions. Stadium capacity from the original 15,000 spectators dropped to just 1,000 spectators.
The future of the stadium.
In August 2015 have political leadership of the city of Pardubice five plans for reconstruction from <a href="KPMG">KPMG</a> company.
